name: Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati
overview: The sixth IIT established in India, known for its scenic campus and research excellence.

courses.name: B.Tech (CSE, ECE, EEE, Mech, Civil, Chemical, BioTech)

name: National Institute of Technology Silchar
overview: One of the premier NITs in the North East, consistently ranked high for engineering.

courses.name: B.Tech (CSE, ECE, EE, Mech, Civil, EIE)

name: Tezpur University
overview: A central university known for its lush green campus and academic quality, often ranked among top universities in India.

courses.name: B.Tech (CSE, ECE, Mech, Civil, Food Tech, Electrical)

name: Gauhati University
overview: The oldest university in North East India, affiliating hundreds of colleges.

name: Dibrugarh University
overview: Major state university serving Upper Assam, known for Petroleum Technology and Management.

name: Assam Agricultural University
overview: The first agricultural university in the North East, pioneering tea research.

name: Assam University
overview: A central university serving the Barak Valley region.

name: Cotton University
overview: Ideally evolved from the historic Cotton College, it is a premier state university for liberal arts and sciences.

name: National Law University and Judicial Academy, Assam
overview: The only National Law University in the North East region (excluding Meghalaya).

name: Gauhati Medical College and Hospital
overview: The premier medical college of Assam and the North East.

name: Assam Medical College
overview: The oldest medical college in North East India (est. 1947).

name: Silchar Medical College and Hospital
overview: Major government medical college serving the Barak Valley.

name: Jorhat Medical College and Hospital
overview: Established in 2009 to serve Upper Assam.

name: Assam Engineering College
overview: Premier government engineering college of Assam, established in 1955.

courses.name: B.Tech (Civil, Mech, Electrical, Chemical, CSE, ETE, I&P)

name: Jorhat Engineering College
overview: Second oldest government engineering college in the North East.

name: Jorhat Institute of Science and Technology
overview: Formerly Science College Jorhat, now offering engineering and science courses.

name: Bineswar Brahma Engineering College
overview: Government engineering college serving the Bodoland Territorial Region.

name: Girijananda Chowdhury Institute of Management and Technology
overview: The first private engineering college in Assam under the Shrimanta Shankar Academy Society.

name: Assam Don Bosco University
overview: First private university in Assam, NAAC 'A' accredited.

name: The Assam Kaziranga University
overview: Leading private university in Upper Assam with a focus on placement.

name: The Assam Royal Global University
overview: Largest private university in Guwahati with world-class infrastructure.

name: Assam Down Town University
overview: Private university with a strong focus on paramedical and nursing sciences.

name: Bodoland University
overview: State university serving the Bodoland Territorial Region.

name: Krishna Kanta Handiqui State Open University
overview: State open university providing distance education.

name: Srimanta Sankaradeva University of Health Sciences
overview: The affiliating health sciences university for Assam.

name: Assam Science and Technology University
overview: The affiliating technical university for engineering and pharmacy colleges in Assam.

name: J.B. Law College
overview: One of the premier law colleges in Assam.

name: NEF Law College
overview: Top private law college in the North East region.

name: Indian Institute of Technology Guwahati
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute

name: National Institute of Technology Silchar
overview: NIRF Ranked Engineering Institute
